trends: There have been no other sightings in Concord Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: between 15 and 20 red/ orange orbs travelling north, then headed west. Numerous formations and patterns.
divs: sighting detailsi was outside on the my cell phone and i looked to the south and noticed a large group of orange\red orbs travelling north and they turned south and formed many different patters from triangles to diamonds to a v-shape then in a large group together then broke apart and travelled in small groups of 4 to 6. i watched them travel west until i could no longer see them. i called my teenage out to see them and they saw the last 4 and took pictures of them. i had a hard time speaking and my cell phone had a small amount of static and i noticed an odor in the air but could not describe it.
